review.title: “Ok to start”
review.pros: Pros – - great worklife balance- never overworked- approachable and friendly management-decisions made quickly
review.cons: Cons – - lack of emphasis on continued professional development- flat management structure: lack of opportunity to 'move up'- low pay
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – If pay is to begin low, in order to at least retain talent, maintain training e.g. advanced excel, VB, SQL etc as focal point
